actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1162.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 and the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1979 and 1980.
short_title: National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Authorizations Act

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce with amendment, H. Rept. 95-1162) National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Authorizations Act - =Title I: Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety= - Amends the Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1979, 1980, and 1981 to carry out the provisions of such Act. =Title II: Motor Vehicles Information and Cost Savings= - Amends the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal years 1979, 1980, and 1981 to carry out the provisions of such Act.

titles.title: National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Authorizations Act
A bill to amend the National Traffic and Motor Vehicle Safety Act of 1966 and the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1979 and 1980.
